list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update main.py to include relationship modification function
Refactored the main.py script to include a method for modifying guest relationship levels. User is now prompted to input names of two persons and their new relationship level. The method dynamically updates a persistent relationship data file. Other minor code rearrangements were also done for improved readability.

task.summary:
Add simulated annealing algorithm for dinner party seat optimization
Implemented a simulated annealing algorithm in 'main.py' to optimize the seating arrangement for a dinner party based on guests' relationships. The relationship and familiarity level of each pair of guests can be inputted and saved for further use. Added numpy as a project dependency and updated README with project explanation and usage examples. Various settings and
